title: How does the 'graphic views' on Hopper Disassembler work?
content:
I would like to understand better what is that information on "graphic views" at the inspector of Hopper Disassembler. I've checked the tutorial but it just skips this section.

Thanks.

comments.text: Can you post a screenshot and point out the parts you don't understand? (use the "edit" link)
@IgorSkochinsky i've just updated, can you take a look? Thank you very much
okay, this is better. Do you get any hints when you hover your mouse over the picture?

answers_data.content:
This seems to be a Hilbert curve representation of the binary's entropy values (probably each pixel is averaged over some small byte range). It was likely inspired by this work:

https://corte.si/posts/visualisation/binvis/index.html
